name: XOX Puzzle
description:
Singleplayer sudoku-like variation of three-in-a-row game in the tic-tac-toe style. It has a large variety of game fields. It is a simple puzzle where you can get achievements, make highscores and compare it with your friends due to integration with Google Game Services.

Rules of this game are rather simple. Some cells contain noughts and crosses. It is necessary to fill in the rest cells so that horizontally, vertically or diagonally there were a maximum of three identical items in a row. The solution of each field is singular.
